name: BPZAround.me
description: BPZAround.me alerts you when someone is building, planning, or zoning around you.

ALLOWED_HOSTS.description: Comma-separaed list of hostnames to allow

DJANGO_DEBUG.description: Setting to 1 enables debug features, such as tracebacks

EXTRA_INSTALLED_APPS.description: Comma-separated list of apps to add to INSTALLED_APPS

SECRET_KEY.description: Used for cyptographic signing, and should be set to a unique, unpredictable value.

SECURE_PROXY_SSL_HEADER.description: HTTP header/value combo that signifies a request is secure

STATIC_ROOT.description: Base path for collected static files

POSTGIS_VERSION.description: PostGIS version, to avoid runtime detection
